item.title: Touch Typing Tutors and Games
item.description: A collection of links to touch typing tutors and games. Online Typing Tutors keybr.com - Typing practice, supports Qwerty, Dvorak, Colemak and Workman layouts The Typing Cat - Free online keyboard typing tutor TypingClub - Learn Touch Typing Free typing.io - Typing Practice for Programmers monkey-type.com - a minimalistic, customizable typing test, featuring many test modes, open source Typing Scout - Faster typing means more spare time :) Ratatype â€” Online typing tutor and typing lessons Solotyping - Touch Typing Course | Online Typing Test | Learn to Type Faster 10FastFingers.
